sn56.19:1.2: Tattha aparimana vanna aparimana byanjana aparimana sankasana:
sn56.19:1.6: ‘idam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccan’ti, bhikkhave, maya pannattam.
sn56.19:1.7: Tattha aparimana vanna aparimana byanjana aparimana sankasana:
sn56.19:2.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
